capabilityDescription.en: Publishes the content of the incoming flowfile to the configured Google Cloud PubSub topic. The processor supports dynamic properties. If any dynamic properties are present, they will be sent along with the message in the form of 'attributes'.
capabilityDescription.zh: 将传入流文件的内容发布到配置的Google Cloud PublishSub主题。处理器支持动态属性。如果存在任何动态属性，它们将以“属性”的形式与消息一起发送。

en.description: Attributes to be set for the outgoing Google Cloud PubSub message
en.value: Value to be set to the attribute

zh.description: 要为传出的Google Cloud PubSub消息设置的属性

en.description: The maximum size of a Google PubSub message in bytes. Defaults to 1 MB (1048576 bytes)

zh.description: The maximum size of a Google PubSub message in bytes. Defaults to 1 MB (1048576 bytes)

en.description: Override the gRPC endpoint in the form of [host:port]

zh.description: Override the gRPC endpoint in the form of [host:port]

en.description: Specifies the Proxy Configuration Controller Service to proxy network requests. Supported proxies: HTTP + AuthN

zh.description: 指定代理配置控制器服务以代理网络请求。支持的代理：HTTP+AuthN

en.description: The Record Reader to use for incoming FlowFiles

zh.description: 用于传入FlowFiles的记录读取器

en.description: Maximum number of FlowFiles processed for each Processor invocation

zh.description: 每个处理器调用处理的最大FlowFiles数

en.description: Indicates the delay threshold to use for batching. After this amount of time has elapsed (counting from the first element added), the elements will be wrapped up in a batch and sent. This value should not be set too high, usually on the order of milliseconds. Otherwise, calls might appear to never complete.

zh.description: Indicates the delay threshold to use for batching. After this amount of time has elapsed (counting from the first element added), the elements will be wrapped up in a batch and sent. This value should not be set too high, usually on the order of milliseconds. Otherwise, calls might appear to never complete.

en.description: The Controller Service used to obtain Google Cloud Platform credentials.

zh.description: 用于获取Google云平台凭据的控制器服务。

en.description: The strategy used to publish the incoming FlowFile to the Google Cloud PubSub endpoint.

zh.description: The strategy used to publish the incoming FlowFile to the Google Cloud PubSub endpoint.

en.description: Indicates the number of messages the cloud service should bundle together in a batch. If not set and left empty, only one message will be used in a batch

zh.description: 指示云服务应在批处理中捆绑在一起的消息数。如果未设置且为空，则批处理中将仅使用一条消息

en.description: The Record Writer to use in order to serialize the data before sending to GCPubSub endpoint

zh.description: The Record Writer to use in order to serialize the data before sending to GCPubSub endpoint

en.description: Name of the Google Cloud PubSub Topic
Publish request gets triggered based on this Batch Bytes Threshold property and the Batch Size Threshold property, whichever condition is met first.

zh.description: Publish request gets triggered based on this Batch Bytes Threshold property and the Batch Size Threshold property, whichever condition is met first.

success.en: FlowFiles are routed to this relationship after a successful Google Cloud Pub/Sub operation.
success.zh: 在成功的Google Cloud Pub/Sub操作之后，FlowFiles被路由到此关系。

failure.en: FlowFiles are routed to this relationship if the Google Cloud Pub/Sub operation fails.
failure.zh: 如果Google Cloud Pub/Sub操作失败，FlowFiles将路由到此关系。

retry.en: FlowFiles are routed to this relationship if the Google Cloud Pub/Sub operation fails but attempting the operation again may succeed.
retry.zh: 如果Google Cloud Pub/Sub操作失败，则FlowFiles将路由到此关系，但再次尝试该操作可能会成功。

en: The entirety of the FlowFile's content will be read into memory to be sent as a PubSub message.
zh: FlowFile的全部内容将被读入内存，作为PubSub消息发送。

gcp.pubsub.messageId.en: ID of the pubsub message published to the configured Google Cloud PubSub topic
gcp.pubsub.messageId.zh: 发布到配置的Google Cloud pubsub主题的pubsub消息的ID

gcp.pubsub.topic.en: Name of the Google Cloud PubSub topic the message was published to
gcp.pubsub.topic.zh: 消息发布到的Google Cloud PubSub主题的名称

gcp.pubsub.count.records.en: Count of pubsub messages published to the configured Google Cloud PubSub topic
gcp.pubsub.count.records.zh: Count of pubsub messages published to the configured Google Cloud PubSub topic
